text: (Allahu) so pe: "E wole ti awon ijo t’o ti re koja lo siwaju yin ninu awon alujannu ati eniyan (ti won ti wa) ninu Ina." Igbakigba ti ijo kan ba wo (inu Ina), won yoo maa sebi fun awon ijo re (t’o ti wa nibe siwaju won), titi di igba ti gbogbo won yoo fi pade ara won ninu Ina. (Igba yii ni) awon eni ikeyin won yoo wi fun awon eni isaaju won pe: "Oluwa wa, awon wonyi ni won si wa lona. Nitori naa, fun won ni ilopo iya meji ninu Ina." (Allahu) so pe: "Ikookan (yin) l’o ni ilopo iya, sugbon eyin ko mo
